explanation: [0-0] In a living room, a young boy is sitting on the floor with two slightly older boys wearing white T-shirts. There's a brown wooden board behind the younger boy. The three boys are playing with toys on the floor. A man in red and a woman in white are sitting on the sofa in the distance. There's a white massage chair next to the woman.

[0-5] Then, a red circle appears in the shot, encircling the younger boy, and a red arrow points at him. Suddenly, the wooden board behind the younger boy is about to fall. The two older boys quickly stand up and raise their hands to support the falling board, preventing it from hitting the younger boy in front.

[5-10] Subsequently, the two older boys hold up the board and place it against the wall again. At the same time, the two women in the distance rush over quickly.
